# Finances

The project is funded as part of the Biodiversity and Ecosystem Services Scenario modelling challenge financed by the <a href="https://www.swissrefoundation.org/">Swiss Re Foundation</a>, <a href="https://www.swissre.com/institute/">Swiss Re Institute</a>, <a href="https://corporatesolutions.swissre.com/">Swiss Re Corporate Solutions</a>, <a href="https://www.ey.com/de_ch">EY</a>, <a href="https://www.wwf.ch/de">WWF</a> and the <a href="https://axa-research.org/">AXA Research Fund</a>.
